extension.description: Tudo o que o media center já tinha, mais aquilo que ainda lhe faltava. Todo o conteudo deste addon provém do Youtube.
Allows you to switch Hyperion off. DISCLAIMER: This add-on only works in LibreELEC/OpenELEC!
Allows you to switch Hyperion off. For all systems EXCEPT LibreELEC and OpenELEC!
Allows you to switch Hyperion On. DISCLAIMER: This add-on only works in LibreELEC/OpenELEC!
Allows you to switch Hyperion On. For all systems EXCEPT LibreELEC and OpenELEC!

Allows you to switch between Hyperion Grabber and Kodi. This addon requires you to make another config file called hyperion.config1.json and put it in the same folder with/without v4l2 code. one config file will be with , one without v4l2 configuration. When this addon is run, it toggles between the two config files. DISCLAIMER: This add-on only works in LibreELEC/OpenELEC!

Allows you to switch between Hyperion Grabber and Kodi. This addon requires you to make another config file called hyperion.config1.json and put it in the same directory with/without v4l2 code. One config file will be with the other without v4l2 configuration. When this addon is run, it toggles between the two config files. For all systems EXCEPT LibreELEC and OpenELEC!
Os irmaos Piologo sao uma dupla de comedia brasileira que ultrapassa todos os limites - ate os do bom senso!
MetallicaTV is dedicated to your favorite band, with all the official videos from Metallica, plus full album streaming.

extension.summary: Addon dedicado à paixão pelo desporto motorizado
extension.description: Channels and Playlists organized by categories. Sourced from Youtube. [B][COLOR lime]Advised the latest version of youtube 6.*.*[/B][/COLOR]

extension.news: [add] Python 3 compat. [add] Settings -> Maintenance -> Delete temporary files [add] Settings -> General -> Rate video after watching [add] Settings -> API -> Enable API configuration page - when enabled, visit http://ipaddress:port/api to configure API keys from a web browser - port is configured in Settings - HTTP Server - Port [chg] Storing personal api keys in api_keys.json [chg] Storing login tokens in access_manager.json [add] youtube_registration module, register developer keys and use them by appending an addon_id=:addon_id parameter to youtube add-on plugin urls [add] screensaver=true parameter to /play route - no suggested videos, no post play events, don't ask for quality [add] play route for channel live streams - plugin://plugin.video.youtube/play/?channel_id=UCLA_DiR1FfKNvjuUpBHmylQ&live=1 [fix] search input, now works with Yatse [fix] Signature deciphering [fix] context menu after playback [fix] alternative player, do not append headers [fix] My Subscriptions (Filtered) channel matching [fix/upd] post play events happen post play [fix/upd] set title from metadata on play [upd] Use monitor to track api key changes [upd] Dutch strings [MB1968] [upd] French strings [bubuleur] [upd] Greek strings [twilight0] [upd] Spanish strings [roliverosc]

extension.description: YouTube הוא אחד מאתרי שיתוף הווידאו הגדולים בעולם.
YouTube ist eines der größten Video-Sharing-Websites der Welt.
YouTube jest jednym z największych na świecie serwisów udostępniania wideo.
A YouTube világ egyik legnagyobb videómegosztó weboldala.
YouTube es uno de los mayores sitios web de intercambio de vídeos del mundo.

extension.description: Данное дополнение позволяет находить и смотреть видео на всеми любимом сайте.

「Youtube」是全世界最大的影片分享網站
YouTube е един от най-големите уеб сайтове за споделяне на видео в целия свят.
Το YouTube είναι μία από τις μεγαλύτερες ιστοσελίδες διαμοιρασμού βίντεο στον κόσμο.

extension.description: IPTV Simple PVR Client unterstützt m3u Wiedergabelisten, Streaming von Live TV für Multicast/Unicast Quellen, Radiosender und EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.
IPTV Simple PVR Client support m3u playlists, streaming of Live TV for multicast/unicast sources, listening to Radio channels and EPG.

O cliente de PVR IPTV Simple Client oferece suporte para listas m3u, transmissão de TV ao vivo de fontes multicast/unicast, transmissão de rádios e, ainda, suporte a guia de programação eletrônico - EPG.
Cliente IPTV Simple PVR com suporte a listas de reprodução m3u, transmissão de TV em direto de fontes multidifusão/unidifusão, ouvir estações de rádio e EPG.

extension.description: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel. Modded by Demagorgon, with new backgrounds, themes and fonts.
extension.news: [B]Based on [I]v6.0.1[/I] of Aeon Nox 5[/B][CR][I]All Versions[/I][CR]- Misc fixes, changes, and/or improvements[CR][I]v6.0.13[/I][CR]- Fix Landscape view Media Menu navigation[CR]- Fix missing lyrics fonts[CR]- Add prefer local logo option to music viz[CR][I]v6.0.12[/I][CR]- Move Video OSD buttons above seekbar[CR]- Update VideoLyrics mod (thanks manfeed)[CR]- Misc PVR fixes and adjustments[CR]- Resize FSK rating images to fit in DialogVideoInfo[CR]- Fixes for Rottentomatoes and Metacritic images and INFOlabels[CR]- Fullscreen Info updates, fixes, and changes[CR]- Use script.colorbox for blur in information dialogs[CR]- Rework DialogMusicInfo[CR][CR]For a full list of changes visit https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master
